name: Basic Platformer (Rayan Aziz) (Rayan Aziz)
description:
Ever wondered how much of a Game can you create without Coding? 

Well, I had the same though few days ago... Then what? I Started making this Short but Awesome Masterpiece. This is basically a Template for you, You can Download it, Play it and then There's a Source Code on my Github for this. You can make it your OWN. I don't really need credits So feel free to Do anything with it. I would love to see your Creations.. Unfortunately there isn't any Documentation for this, But guess what.. There is no need for it.. All you need is a Little bit of Understanding of BOLT (Unity Visual Scripting Tool).

Most important things of All...  *IT'S FREE* (You can Donate though, if you like)

FEATURES:

  • Basic Platformer Movement like every other
  • Cool Animations on almost every Object (except FLOOR n SKY lol)
  • You can Double Jump
  • Use of Particles
  • Use of Shaders
  • Definitely not a Messy Visual Scripting
  • Easy to Understand
  • Open Source

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: (Can literally run on your Potato PC)
